definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Farmers are revolting over a new sliding-scale increase in export taxes.
sentences.chinese: 农场主对新出台的出口税率浮动上调政策非常不满。

sentences.english: And we didn't do that. We just let the price float.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有这么做，我们让价格浮动。

sentences.english: There will be floating hotels in the center of the capital along Moskva river embankments next year.
sentences.chinese: 明年在莫斯科市中心的莫斯科河上将出现浮动酒店。

sentences.english: Analysis and comment are made on the floating cylinder sleeve method known in late years.
sentences.chinese: 对近几年来发表的浮动缸套测量法进行了分析和评述。

sentences.english: The fish was silvery and still and floated with the waves.
sentences.chinese: 那鱼是银色的，一动不动地随着波浪浮动着。

sentences.english: The float container will expand to encompass all interior float elements.
sentences.chinese: 浮动容器会被扩大以包含所有内部的浮动元素。

sentences.english: The float container will expand to encompass all interior float elements.
sentences.chinese: 浮动容器会被扩大以包含所有内部的浮动元素。

sentences.english: Pilot to float interest rates starts at CMB .
sentences.chinese: 央行将在招行实行试点，实施市场浮动利率。

sentences.english: You can disable this behavior by moving the slider to the left-most position.
sentences.chinese: 你可以移动浮动块到最左边的位置来禁止这个特性。

sentences.english: Summer brings 24 hours of sunlight and the thawing shifting landscape.
sentences.chinese: 夏天带来了24小时的阳光和融化浮动的冰景。

sentences.english: Your individual hotel costs may be lower or higher based on the favorability of your margins.
sentences.chinese: 你的单个酒店成本可能会根据毛利率高低而浮动。

sentences.english: And it just bounces around, hovering around 100.
sentences.chinese: 这个值一直在变化，在100上下浮动。

sentences.english: Allows multiple control bars to be floated in a single mini-frame window.
sentences.chinese: 允许多个控制条浮动在单个小框架窗口中。

sentences.english: Annual bonus includes two parts, the fixed bonus and variable bonus.
sentences.chinese: 年度奖金包括两部分，固定奖金和浮动奖金。

sentences.english: Price is floating, please contact freely for best price.
The fish was silvery and till and floated with the waves.
sentences.chinese: 那鱼是银色的，一动不动地随着波浪浮动着。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to roll/(to do sth) in a loop/to scroll (computing)/to progressively expand (economics)/to rumble (of thunder)
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
to be on the move/to roam or wander/to circulate (of goods or capital)
